g:HTMLPanel.div:
This seminar is meant to help introduce advanced web developers to the new capabilities and ideas with the soon to be released Google Web Toolkit 2.1 (Release Candidate currently available)
Anyone is welcome to attend this free seminar. We only ask that you RSVP. The Information Systems Program at Carnegie Mellon along with Acrinta, LLC will host this event on November 30th at 6:00pm.
Feel free to contact gwt@acrinta.com with any questions or comments about the seminar.
Since the seminar is bout learning GWT 2.1 and the popular topics dealing with building large "enterprise" web applications, we have built this small app using many of the ideas you will see in much larger GWT applications. We have also made the source code publicly available at:
http://www.github.com/ashtonthomas/gwt-seminar
